name: Aave
description: Aave is a decentralized finance protocol that allows users to lend and borrow a variety of digital assets on the Avalanche network.

missions.name: AAVE SUPPLY ON AVALANCHE
missions.description: Supply assets on Aave's protocol on the Avalanche network and earn rewards.

quests.name: Supply Asset
quests.description: Deposit an asset to Aave on the Avalanche network.

tasks.name: Deposit Asset
tasks.description: Deposit an asset to Aave and start earning interest.

quests.name: Borrow Asset
quests.description: Borrow an asset from Aave on the Avalanche network.

tasks.name: Borrow Asset
tasks.description: Borrow an asset using Aave's lending protocol.

badge.name: Aave Supply Champion
badge.description: Awarded for depositing assets on Aave via the Avalanche network.
